metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6624 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
jhead through 3.04 has a heap-based buffer over-read in process_DQT injpgqguess.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:2.97-1+deb8u2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jhead package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.97-1+deb8u2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
